parameters.description: Sort by column. Can be used multiple times; prepend hyphen for descending order. Sortable columns are actor_id, actor_name, action, request_id, id, created_at.
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Return logs created before the specified time. Value should be in the format 2020-01-01T00:00:00Z. If not supplied, this will default to the current time.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Return logs created after the specified time. Value should be in the format 2020-01-01T00:00:00Z. If not supplied, this will default to 1 year before the current time.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: actor_id

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: actor_name

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: action

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq
parameters.name: request_id

parameters.description: Filter results by column value. Valid filter predicates are eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte
parameters.name: created_at
